267223209468811046.Text: %PCName!  You...you're here...and...well...I mean...you've returned!  Have you...that is...do you know...what has happened to my...my airship?
Script: Choice "I found the wreckage of the airship, crashed into the mountains on Solstheim.  Sadly, there were no survivors.  I have recovered the captain's journal for you.  It explains everything." 6

2153163711741830996.Text: %PCName!  You...you're here...and...well...I mean...you've returned!  What news?
Script: Choice "Nothing yet, Louis, but I'm working on it." 1

12477278821875413117.Text: %PCName!  You...you're here...and...well...I mean...you've returned!  What news?
Script: Choice "I found the wreckage of the airship, crashed into the mountains on Solstheim.  Sadly, there were no survivors.  I have recovered the captain's journal for you.  It explains everything." 2

11607278131111020816.Text: %PCName!  You...you're here...and...well...I mean...you've returned!  What news?
Script: Choice "I explored Hrothmund's Barrow and found the Amulet of Infectious Charm.  I still don't have any evidence showing what happened to the airship, though." 3

349314651485622512.Text: %PCName!  You...you're here...and...well...I mean...you've returned!  What news?
Script: Choice "I found the wreckage of the airship, but there were no survivors. I have recovered the captain's journal, which explains everything. I've recovered the Amulet of Infectious Charm as well." 4

438109831262019262.Text: %PCName!  You...you're here...and...well...I mean...you've returned!  What news?  Have you...do you have...the Amulet of Infectious Charm?
Script: Choice "I have recovered the Amulet of Infectious Charm from Hrothmund's Barrow." 5

2414351711554517395.Text: Oh...um...hello...hi...that is...nice to know...um...meet you, %PCName. For a second I...I thought you were the courier...with a...a message...that is, with word of...um, my airship.
Script: Choice "I'm no courier, Mr. Beauchamp, but I think I know what happened to your airship.  I found a crash site on Solstheim and recovered the captain's journal.  It does not tell a happy tale." 8

297691421819063538.Text: %PCName!  You...you're here...and...well...I mean...you've returned!  What news?  Have you...do you have...the Amulet of Infectious Charm?
Script: Choice "Not yet, Louis, but I'll recover it soon enough." 7

19405232222540710188.Text: Oh...ah...%PCName.  Back again...for more..um...great...I mean, interesting...well, maybe...nice..conversation, hmmm?  You...you know...I still need someone...anyone, really...to help me find out where...that is, what happened to my...my airship...and help me get that...that amulet I need.  I still fear that, well...that my crew has failed me.

2535126652162589477.Text: Oh...um...hello...hi...that is...nice to know...um...meet you, %PCName. For a second I...I thought you were the courier...with a...a message...that is, with word of...um, my airship. Wait! Is..is that it?  Up..there, in the sky..there!  Oh...no, it's just a...um...a cliff racer. Ummm...ahhh...yes....ahem....

2343294341535712731.Text: Oh, %PCName.  Won...wonderful to see...I mean...that is to say...isn't the weather...um...not too harsh...well, I know, it's quite dreadful actually...and I...um....  Well, um...can I help you with something?

312572244277831482.Text: Stranger, I implore you. Can we travel together, with you acting as my escort? I must get back to the Cult shrine at Fort Frostmoth!

7922285691167828021.Text: Please...please just let me go.  I... You...you're not Erich....  Please, stranger, help me!  I'm being held prisoner!  Release me! Get me out of here!

93882371312510797.Text: %PCName, you old dog!  What brings you back to Thirsk, the fine mead or the finer lasses? Ha!

9278293522820029392.Text: Beautiful %PCName!  It's been too long since my eyes took in your full splendor! How can I please ye today, lass?

261433066267412580.Text: Ah, fair %PCName. It's true, the women around here say my lips are sweeter than the mead of Thirsk. Have ye come to find out for yourself, lass?

21751110332309118300.Text: Hail, %PCClass. Been enjoying our women as well as our mead, I hope!

2394417255299996810.Text: Anything for a beautiful girl like you, %PCName. What can Big Erich do to help?

7441128832522525788.Text: Ask your questions, but be quick, %PCClass. I'm a busy man.

2245303675905637.Text: Well well, aren't you a pretty little pup.  What do you want?  Speak up, wench -- I'm a busy man!

2549077162907512069.Text: I knew you'd be back, %PCName.  It seems you women can never get enough of Big Erich.

15915104702809517947.Text: %PCName. You're the last person I expected to see. Did you come to my house to witness the spectacle? To gaze upon Ingmar the Unfit, Ingmar the Weak, Ingmar the Untested? You robbed me of victory. Robbed me of my place among my people! Now, you come into my very home, to mock me? You shall pay for your treachery!

30870317042443828537.Text: Um, oh, yes %PCRace?  I'm sorry, I was just thinking of my boy Tymvaul....

10757180762847917646.Text: If you need shrine services just ask, but be quick.  I have an important Cult matter on my mind right now.

334783212747428853.Text: I have nothing more to say to you, %PCName.  You have Pinetear.  Give it to Kolfinna as payment of wergild, and leave me to my guilt.

1423088732330123943.Text: Hello again, %PCName.  I'm still looking to hire an explorer, if you're interested.

3254722432641722279.Text: All right then. When you find something worthwhile, you know where to find me.

580727395628519320.Text: Hmmm.... Let me see....  No...no...wait...yes!  Oh...hmmm....no....  I'm afraid this isn't what I'm looking for, %PCName. Please continue your explorations, and do be more certain next time.

277842277476786517.Text: Ah, %PCName. Wonderful to see you again. I'm afraid I'll be leaving shortly, however. I'm heading off to Skyrim, you see...after a drink or three. I have renewed confidence in my quest now, thanks to you, and am eager to see what I may discover in the Nords' homeland. Farewell, and keep exploring!

25638323432841031220.Text: "Fall of the Snow Prince," you say?  Fascinating.  Let me see it.  Hmmm...yes...yes...amazing!  By my Falmer ancestors, you've done it, %PCName!  The account in this tome is remarkable!  Rieklings indeed!  I don't see how this Snow Prince could have been anything BUT a Falmer, do you?  Splendid, splendid.  You're a credit to explorers everywhere, %PCName.  Here's the gold, as promised, and thank you!

26086230462119628166.Text: %PCName, you've returned.  Have you found any evidence of the Falmer here on Solstheim?
Script: Choice "Not yet, Athellor.  But I'll keep looking." 1 "Yes, I found an ancient set of armor and a spear, in the Jolgeirr Barrow.  There was a book, as well -- 'The Fall of the Snow Prince.'  The description of the title character is rather interesting." 3

4328204501990420207.Text: %PCName, you've returned.  Have you found any evidence of the Falmer here on Solstheim?
Script: Choice "Not yet, Athellor.  But I'll keep looking." 1 "Yes, I found...this thing here.  Does it help?" 2

69901185010434891.Text: Well hello there, %PCName.  You don't look like one of the natives, and I don't recall seeing you on the last ship from Vvardenfell.  Perhaps you're a mercenary?  I'm here to do some research, myself.  Please, join me for a drink.

1981943751990824988.Text: Hail, %PCName! It is good to see you again!  Welcome to my home.  I was hoping you would stop by. I have something for you. In honor of my defeat of the Valbrandr draugr, my fellow Skaal presented me with a Belt of Orc's Strength.  Here -- I want you to have it.  After all, you earned it.  My thanks again for everything.

305938992357118148.Text: Leave me, %PCName.  I asked for your help, and you refused.  We have no more business together.

1649411669618922441.Text: You...you attacked the draugr! Bad enough I had you serve as a distraction, but now I can't even claim the killing blow!  Now I must return to my village, either a liar or a failure. I trusted you, %PCName. Leave me now,  to ponder my hopeless fate.

1122911765647629599.Text: By the gods, that was a good fight!  Did you see me? I was magnificent!  With the draugr dead, I am truly a man.  I've got to get back to the Skaal Village and tell my brothers the good news.  If you're ever in the village, come to my house and I shall greet you as a brother. Oh, and %PCName...I trust you'll keep this between the two of us.  I wish I could offer some kind of reward, but I have so little. I know -- I shall leave the draugr's treasure be.  It is yours, my friend. Take all you like!

9186256802198116813.Text: Ah, %PCName!  Been helping yourself to the draugr's treasures, I hope!

27537443924823120.Text: I trusted you not to attack the draugr, %PCName, and you betrayed me. You have doomed me to a life of hopelessness!  Leave me, deceiver!

1087320572410029053.Text: Hail, %PCName. I'm not sure what your business is out here in the wild, but I'm glad you're not one of my Skaal brothers.  They'd surely wonder why I'm not inside the barrow, killing the Valbrandr draugr.

1608418038579720726.Text: Tymvaul?  Is that you, son?  Oh..oh I'm sorry.  Please forgive the ramblings brought on by an old man's anguish.

5557216642280418677.Text: Intruder!  Who dares venture so deeply into the halls of Rimhull?!  The Mantle of Woe is mine, do you hear?  I have claimed the robe and its power!

5891697761645509.Text: Well met, %PCName. So, you're a visistor to our fair island. Hmmm.... There's a certain look about you, friend. You're no stranger to death, or killing. I have some dark business you may be able to help me with.

27692126492450930080.Text: So, have you changed your mind? Will you help me in my dark business?

23776208161072420656.Text: What news do you bring me, %PCName? Is our dark business complete?

241471140010399194.Text: Just because we had some business together, don't think we're friends. Now go. I suspect my husband will be back any time now.

597948250731614.Text: So, Kolfinna is seeking wergild for the death of her husband, eh? Never! Pinetear has been in my family for generations and will be for generations to come. Besides, Gustav got what he had coming.

34222029238526611.Text: You look pretty far from home, stranger. What do you want?

2266432668272463.Text: Hello stranger. I am afraid we meet under tragic circumstances, for I grieve for the death of my husband, Gustav Two-Teeth. He was struck down in cold blood by a barbarian named Sigvatr the Strong, over a foolish argument.

11397230202253620097.Text: You stopped Krish, and that is good. Grahl are gone. Krish is gone. Nasty grahl. Nasty Krish. The master will be pleased when he comes home. Your master will be pleased you have helped Dulk! Good good! Now go. Dulk has much to do before his master comes back. Go!

2747519102473220701.Text: You are here! The master told me there would be one coming! You must help. Krish is trying to take control of the castle. He has found nasty grahl to help him! You must kill them all! My master will be pleased! Your master will be pleased. Go now, through the Banquet Hall to the caverns. They wait down there! Go now or the master will not be happy!

19233263892507312506.Text: You go now! Master will be back soon. I am sure of this! And I must keep things right for him. Back soon. He will be back soon.

764918564184519354.Text: What are you doing here? The master will not be pleased! And you come with Krish! Evil, evil Krish! Krish is bad, and you are bad for helping him. What is it you want? You should leave.

19387319521896125253.Text: I got nothing more to do with you. Finish your business and get outta here. I've got work to do.

15634282612659120813.Text: Just gotta get to that passage upstairs now. My sense of direction isn't the best. You lead the way.

112977253163236084.Text: Okay, that's all of them. You can talk to that annoying little Dulk if you want. I'll be right behind you.

1284297682371223285.Text: Look, if you want to get upstairs, you've gotta help me out. We've gotta get rid of these grahl. All of them. Must be about eight. I'm not leaving them here in the basement for when I run this place.

1007553131631515279.Text: I was telling you how I've got my own problems.

366228171040622388.Text: Hey! You killed off all the trolls! Look, let me tell you what's been going on here, and then we can talk about how I can help you out now.

493623105902821679.Text: Whoa! A %PCRace. Ugly thing, aren't you. Too tall. What business you got at Castle Karstaag? And make it quick. No time to talk.

26028132161158010114.Text: The Ristaag has failed. We waited too long to complete it. You should return to Wind-Eye and see what he has to say.

2047286432128827099.Text: What can Long-Tooth do for you?

16877295951793710772.Text: What have you done with the heart? Find it, and give it to Wind-Eye immediately!

21959226952395721428.Text: You have the heart! This is good. Return now to the village, and give the heart to Wind-Eye. You have done well tonight, %PCName. Rolf Long-Tooth calls you friend. I will remain here in these woods for a time. The All-Maker has chosen you to finish this journey alone. Good luck to you.

253293413167023317.Text: The Spirit Bear is dead, and the Ristaag is nearly complete. Remove the heart of the Bear. It must be returned immediately.

21874252681609223583.Text: We have defeated those creatures and honored our fallen comrades. Now, though, we must find the Spirit Bear and return its heart to Wind-Eye. You have proven yourself a valiant warrior. You shall lead the way for the rest of the Ristaag.

3064321187274261756.Text: You and I must continue the Ristaag. Only when the heart of the Spirit Bear is returned to Wind-Eye shall the All-Maker be pleased. Let us go.

2481581481971429807.Text: Axe-Wife is dead? No! She was a good warrior, and a good friend. We will not let this stop us, though. We two will continue until the Ristaag is complete.

32372313203221925075.Text: Quickly now! Check on Grerid Axe-Wife. I worry there are more of the beasts afoot.

1465518126102302360.Text: What was that? Blast! These creatures are everywhere. Quick, find Grerid Axe-Wife! Do not allow the hunt to be disrupted! I will wait for your return.

30138110392689419038.Text: Shhh...we must hunt carefully and quietly. There is no time to talk.

4845265142190616165.Text: Sattir is dead? This is a bad omen. These creatures are dark spirits indeed, and they will try to disrupt the hunt. We will not allow this to happen. The loss of Sattir is great, but we must continue. Let us go.

16855265312819014285.Text: Go! Investigate that sound. Go to Sattir and return to me.

2614307930961605.Text: Did you hear that? It came from near Sattir the Bold's path. Go to him, %PCName, and make sure he is well. Then, return to me so we may complete the hunt.

3127417040324627181.Text: The Ristaag has failed. I have nothing more to say.

798187111319127057.Text: Shhh...we must hunt carefully and quietly. There is no time to talk. Get back to Long-Tooth! That is where you are to be for the Ristaag.

24345120642290313801.Text: The Ristaag has failed. There is no more to say.

24414313712660211552.Text: Shhh...we must hunt carefully and quietly. There is no time to talk. Get back to Long-Tooth! That is where you are to be for the Ristaag.

11861218360632668.Text: Shhh...we must hunt carefully and quietly. There is no time to talk.

18014169482960017239.Text: Come back at nightfall, my friend. We will perform the Ristaag only when the moons watch over us.

38961339757007651.Text: You are the one who will be performing the Ristaag with us! Excellent. Rolf Long-Tooth will explain the part you will play.

1458918815164511979.Text: I understand you are to be a part of the Ristaag. This is a great honor for you. You should speak with Long-Tooth about your duties in the ceremony.

3928195122329183.Text: Greetings, %PCName. Korst Wind-Eye has told me much about you. You are to perform the Ristaag with us, pleasing the All-Maker.

14708102491166918715.Text: It is done. My time is over. You have done a service here today. Both to me, and to the people of this island. Now I may rest. Before I go, take this. May you have the strength of will to continue your own journey.

25975301582375416567.Text: There is more to my story, mortal. It is time for you to either listen or die, for my work is not complete.

9350210202355119218.Text: You are brave or foolish to enter this place, %PCRace. But I sense a bit of wisdom in you...perhaps. I might kill you where you stand, were you to try and keep me from my task, but there are more dangerous things in these caves then this poor soul.

281728827226583794.Text: None of the Skaal will speak with you while you live under the shadow of the beast. Speak with Wind-Eye if you feel you have been cured, but until then, you are not welcome.

2678529122216412612.Text: The time of the Bloodmoon has passed, and the Skaal endure. Blessings of the All-Maker upon you, Blodskaal.

52361954832469219.Text: It seems you have lifted the veil of shadow from your soul. No longer do you walk with the beast. The passing of the Bloodmoon brings many great tidings.

6316253651636128106.Text: Well met, friend. I see you've returned from the Lake. Heart-Fang wanted to see you. He's in the Greathall.

29988231203253220302.Text: None of the Skaal will speak with you while you live under the shadow of the beast. Speak with Wind-Eye if you feel you have been cured, but until then, you are not welcome.

1205124637736622568.Text: None of the Skaal will speak with you while you live under the shadow of the beast. Speak with Wind-Eye if you feel you have been cured, but until then, you are not welcome.

22973296701317213466.Text: One of the creatures went into the Greathall! It must be stopped!

16757142681618426741.Text: Please, you must help. The village is under attack by the werewolves! Outside, quickly!!!

94616515287744870.Text: The beasts must be killed! You must assist the guards!

2209675272075720576.Text: You have cleared my husband's name. What can I do for you?

32057195401792128748.Text: You are the one who is to investigate a crime that has been blamed on my husband. How may I help you?

26666326902586726328.Text: I have nothing to say. My time is done.

17069797242319491.Text: You know my crime. Get on with your job.

26098124701462813987.Text: Yes? I understand you are investigating Engar Ice-Mane's theft. A terrible thing. But, you were sent to investigate a crime--what can I do for you, outlander?

2977131965308834447.Text: You have cleared my name and restored my honor. What can I do for you, my friend?

30556102651615731232.Text: You, who are to be my judge, what would you ask of me?

14886229411303327677.Text: I sense the shadow of the beast is upon you, %PCName. The Skaal have nothing to say to you while you live with such a curse.

2636425617225557735.Text: The Bloodmoon Prophecy is no more, and the Skaal live on. The time of Tharsten Heart-Fang is passed, but the Skaal will remember him as a once-great warrior who has fallen.

290657327146159536.Text: I fear the time of the Bloodmoon Prophecy is upon us. The Skaal must be constantly on guard.

1565326552349613025.Text: It is good to speak with you again, now that the curse of the beast has been lifted from your soul. Let us speak of the Bloodmoon Prophecy.

1750211160148319684.Text: Have you learned more about the death of the horkers yet, or the involvement of Karstaag and his Riekling minions?

325662263167832251.Text: These have been difficult times for the Skaal, and it appears for you as well. I sense that you no longer live with the curse of the beast. This is good, as there have been ominous signs reported on the island.

762111102163442488.Text: Unfortunately, the Ristaag has failed. It comes as no surprise to me that there have been ominous signs reported on the island.

24158216271316846.Text: Thanks to your help, the Ristaag is complete, yet there have been ominous signs reported on the island.

95028636304831425.Text: You were to assist in performing the Ristaag. Have you been successful?

16739876948815289.Text: It is good to speak with you again, now that the curse of the beast has been lifted from your soul. Though our first attempts to claim the Totem of Claw and Fang failed, we were finally successful. We must now prepare for the ceremony to please the All-Maker.

836023522029323274.Text: It is good to speak with you again. We must now prepare for the ceremony to please the All-Maker.

18275261532012623029.Text: You were to retrieve the Totem of Claw and Fang, a dangerous mission indeed. Have you been successful?

456722911353319365.Text: Greetings, Blodskaal. Now that you have struggled out from under the curse of the beast, you and I must speak of the Ristaag.

240861350657846783.Text: Greetings, Blodskaal. You and I must speak of the Ristaag.

6991202761063622152.Text: You had the shadow of the beast upon you, after you had been infected. Yet, I sense something is different.

4255228791889067.Text: You have been infected too long, and I sense the shadow of the beast upon you. You are not welcome here.

5459204642516532497.Text: I know you have been infected by these werewolves. Have you taken care of this problem?

2497260363070019146.Text: I've only just arrived, and to this horror. It is good you were here to protect these people.

11890307131777030169.Text: Travel back to the Skaal village. I will meet you there soon. You have done well here.

271356762257920696.Text: What of Aesliip, my friend? You were sent to kill the powerful draugr and prove your strength to the Skaal.

162287955868510271.Text: You were sent to prove your strength. This is to occur here, where there is a disturbance on the lake.

12996248862841332351.Text: Ah...you've arrived. These are strange times, my friend. I am unsure what magic is being worked to cause such a disturbance on the lake, but you were sent here to prove your strength.

2538744491433731542.Text: Hello again, friend. What may I do for you?

2582112969107021320.Text: You were to perform the Ritual of the Gifts. I hope your way has been easy.

218584833868416565.Text: Greetings to you, wanderer. Why have you come to our village?

4332288802231113170.Text: My greetings to you, wanderer. We of the Skaal do not get many visitors. What winds have brought you to our lands? I can only imagine it is the attack on the Imperial fort that we have heard whispers of.

1233013037240165527.Text: This is as far as we go, %PCName. I have the key to reach the next stage of the Hunter's challenge, and only I shall continue. This Hunt is for Heart-Fang and Heart-Fang alone. Many generations have I lived now, Hircine's Ring on my finger. This Hunt is my birthright! Heart-Fang alone shall face the Hunter. Heart-Fang alone shall earn the glory of the Hunt! See now the power I was born to wield! You now face Heart-Fang in his true form, the form he was born to wear!

297031283692619216.Text: Let us continue. Heart-Fang must find a way out of this place!

12211297551019628342.Text: Ahhh...so it is you, %PCName. But I see you have taken on another form. No matter. This Hunt is for Heart-Fang and Heart-Fang alone. Many generations have I lived now, with Hircine's Ring on my finger. This Hunt is my birthright, %PCName! Heart-Fang alone shall face the Hunter. Heart-Fang alone shall earn the glory of the Hunt! See now the power I was born to wield! Prepare to face me in my true form!

288091779322294097.Text: It's you, %PCName! How did you get to this place? We've little time, I fear. The frost giant Karstaag has gone ahead. Even now, I fear he may win this battle before me. Perhaps together we can fight through this place.

2491712492592719822.Text: You heard the man...GO! Help our people!

283812497113506022.Text: You've returned from the lake! You continue to surprise me, %PCName. I have matters to attend to now. We will speak again soon. That I promise you.

24612288791010925834.Text: You are to prove your strength as a warrior of the Skaal. If you have not gone yet to speak to Wind-Eye, do it now.

26973232212588411251.Text: Halfhand is not dead, yet the Caenlorn have been killed? What have you done, %PCName? You are lucky I do not strike you down where you stand. However, I am not a shaman, and I do not hold the Caenlorn in as high regard as they do. Halfhand will be exiled. And you will prove your strength as a warrior if you wish to remain among the Skaal.

14898127631662920798.Text: You have done well, %PCName. Make sure Halfhand gets fed to the wolves, and then we will speak of other things.

21669170401701418130.Text: You have done well, %PCName. You have shown your loyalty and wisdom, but there is one thing further I will require of you. Now you must prove your strength as a warrior.

13443154251687319721.Text: You've investigated the crime. Now it is time for you to make a decision. The verdict is yours to decide.

27510207931402617223.Text: You were to investigate a crime. Have you done this?

986332360286620934.Text: You have shown your loyalty to the Skaal. Now it is time to prove your wisdom.

490618045126615171.Text: You were told to perform the rituals needed to restore the power of the Skaal. What have you done?

1929830229122142844.Text: I was trying to explain to you, outlander, that you have much to atone for.

27099147812040728032.Text: Yes, outlander? What is your business here?

510835113482771.Text: There is no more to say to you, stranger. The Skaal wish you no harm, but state your business here quickly.

24638205231777111247.Text: What do you want, stranger? The Skaal wish you no harm, but you will mind your manners while you are within our walls. We will make no exceptions. Now, what is this I hear about an attack on the Imperial fort?

767027404416328652.Text: What do you want, stranger? The Skaal wish you no harm, but you will mind your manners while you are within our walls. We will make no exceptions. Now, what is this I hear about an attack on the Imperial fort?

5994255621904029621.Text: The Skaal wish you no harm for now. But we do not know you, and we have no reason to want to know you. Leave here until you have reason to be among us.

391814678251102377.Text: Welcome, friend. How may I help you? The time of prophecy has passed, and the Skaal live on for another era.

2790977481963314129.Text: The time of the Bloodmoon is gone, and the Skaal live on.

21227179221687319207.Text: The werewolves have been defeated and Wind-Eye has returned. You should speak with him immediately.

14640243481696032392.Text: You are not of the Skaal. Speak with Tharsten Heart-Fang in the Greathall. He is our leader, and will deal with you.

12012240222806132420.Text: You are not of the Skaal. Speak with Tharsten Heart-Fang in the Greathall if you have reason to be here. He is our leader, and will deal with you.

39301263895486482.Text: This Skaal has nothing to say to you, stranger. Speak with Heart-Fang if you believe you've got business here.

21678316462971316946.Text: What is it you ask of this Skaal?

256771030330877297.Text: I'll be gone soon. I promise you that.

25906193948468855.Text: Wait! Look, I don't want any trouble. I heard you were working with Saenus Lusius, and everyone at the fort knows that Lusius is a reasonable man, so maybe we can make a deal.

122762577616445965.Text: I've nothing to say to you.

1127625935149917108.Text: Carius is back! I don't know where he was, but I knew he'd find a way home. Things'll go much better with him around.

121358563532626322.Text: Still no word from the Captain. I suppose we have to figure he's gone for good.

17551270011773511814.Text: Were you able to find the Captain? What did those Nords have to say?

3178623453364112607.Text: You heard what Lusius said. Get up to those Nords and find the Captain!

10750881266998168.Text: You know what you need to do! Get up to those Nords and find the Captain!

1604519270189932266.Text: You've got to find the Captain! The fort needs him!

296401292608821267.Text: He's gone! Those creatures took him during the battle. Someone has got to find the Captain! And where's Lusius? He's dead, too? This is horrible!

236130638108512271.Text: He's gone! Those creatures took him during the battle. Someone has got to find the Captain!

1464325841537425883.Text: What the...? Someone attacked the fort while we were gone! We've gotta find the Cap'n right now!

31202322001389431621.Text: Someone's gotta find the Captain! Gotta figure out what happened here!

25641257162504322840.Text: Huh? You want us to travel together? I think that's what the Cap'n wants, so we better stick together. Besides, I'm handy to have around.

231033110495513861.Text: Gonna work with Lusius, huh? Can't say I blame you. He's one smart guy.

38560013040329840.Text: Cap'n said you'd be by. I'm supposed to assist you with something?

2348717043117163335.Text: There has been no word from the Captain. I fear the worst.

289018642493719579.Text: Captain Carius has returned. He's said very little about his ordeal, but we are all just glad he is back where he belongs. Fort Frostmoth will be stronger than ever.

1638111468175893831.Text: As I said, someone must find the Captain!

268543604295948623.Text: As I said, someone must find the Captain!

13282156451364528343.Text: From what Artoria has told us, the course is clear. You must travel to the Nord village and see what they know about the attack.

27140127253223731449.Text: Thank the gods you've returned! I see that Artoria has not returned with you. This day is filled with horrible news. There was a terrible battle. And Captain Carius...someone must find the Captain!

223981908204043980.Text: Thank the gods you've returned! There was a terrible battle. And Captain Carius...someone must find the Captain!

573264902532323637.Text: Wait! Something here is amiss. The fort has been attacked while we were gone. We must find Captain Carius immediately!

295389804147599156.Text: He wants to make a deal with you, does he?

1142220652806514659.Text: Yes? Would you like to continue to travel together? I imagine it would be best with the task at hand. Captain Carius wishes for us to work together.

855119299901925858.Text: I understand you have chosen to work with my compatriot, Gaea Artoria. There is no finer warrior in Fort Frostmoth, save perhaps Captain Carius. I wish you both the best of luck.

1323130865661912093.Text: Captain Carius mentioned that you might come to speak with me. How may I assist you?

2012220162224482.Text: What can I do for you?

1019284462359315447.Text: What is it you want? I heard you were asking around about this being a dry fort.

29365221612949917004.Text: What is it you want? I heard you were asking around about this being a dry fort.

972293672899614003.Text: What is it you want? I heard you might be able to get hold of some booze.

185683669264577191.Text: What do you w.... Hey, is that booze I smell on you?

2608826726101864575.Text: What do you w.... Hey, is that booze I smell on you?

223511596874523027.Text: What do you w.... Hey, is that booze I smell on you?

531022249522514225.Text: What do you w.... Hey, is that booze I smell on you?

723830667146951877.Text: What do you w.... Hey, is that booze I smell on you?

883524943187015880.Text: What do you w.... Hey, is that booze I smell on you?

4929342116069897.Text: I got nothing to say. Sure could use a drink, though. And not that Nord swill.

195825402482818320.Text: Hello, %PCName. What can I do for you?

192582019737516815.Text: It is good to see you again. I believed I was dead for sure, but as the glacier toppled around me, I was transported outside. I am glad that you, too, survived the ordeal. Now, how may I help you?

18620518993105625.Text: I will wait here and guard the gate. Good luck, my friend.

1950232247104372727.Text: Wait, my friend. I can go not further. This contest can have only one victor, and you will have to be the one. Perhaps if you are able to escape, I will find my way out in time. For now, I will guard this gate and make sure none of the beasts follow you through. Take care if you encounter the others. Karstaag is a wild creature, and will certainly try to kill you. Heart-Fang worries me...there is something wild in his eyes that I do not trust. Good luck, %PCName.

1251947362100432537.Text: Let us continue through this maze.

285416150191717184.Text: You! Do not think that I cannot see through the form you now wear. I am sorry it must come to this, %PCName. I had thought better of you. It is clear, though, that you have joined with these dark forces. Killing you will be an act of mercy.

29774176462541616508.Text: %PCName, it is you! I am sorry you, too, have been brought to play in this nefarious game. Since the werewolves captured me at the fort, I have been held here by this demon Hircine. Soon, others joined me: one of the Nords, named Heart-Fang, along with a beast named Karstaag. I believe the only hope for escape is to find our way through this maze.

11742273061804126792.Text: There is some commotion outside. You'd better get out there and check on it. We'll speak later.

24355378997307886.Text: Have you found more information on the weapons being smuggled from the fort?

2004130733263741839.Text: You've helped me deal with the low morale at the fort, perhaps you can help me with some other fort business.

15741292702017321430.Text: I asked you to investigate why the morale has been low in the fort. Have you learned anything?

220125762684819907.Text: I was mentioning to you that the men seem edgy.

137632770207883628.Text: Yes? What can I do for you? I am Captain Falx Carius, commander of Fort Frostmoth.

25759284532884413267.Text: There is still no word from Captain Carius. We will have to learn to manage here without him.

1465721479153773983.Text: Captain Carius has returned! I've not heard the story, but he is in his chambers.

2719126091197493678.Text: What will we do without the Captain here? This is terrible. Something must be done. What if those creatures come back?

13724284662520325237.Text: Terrible stuff happening here. But...I've got business to attend to. What do you need?

128028663279539098.Text: The fort...the creatures. It's horrible. And, the Captain, I haven't seen him.... Find Lusius...he may know what to do.

16959313671113226692.Text: The fort...the creatures. It's horrible. And, the Captain, I haven't seen him.... Find Artoria...she may know what to do.

3228316142945018938.Text: The fort...the creatures. It's horrible. And, the Captain, I haven't seen him....

5785324155371234.Text: What do you want? Go see Captain Carius. He's in his chambers at the fort. Head through the General Quarters and all the way up the south staircase. On the third floor are his chambers. If you're here about that colony business, talk to Carnius Magius. He's in the Imperial Cult Shrine.

14424134471853613220.Text: What do you want? Go see Captain Carius. He's in his chambers at the fort. Head through the General Quarters and all the way up the south staircase. On the third floor are his chambers. If you're here about that colony business, talk to Carnius Magius. He's in the Imperial Cult Shrine.

1742919251110211032.Text: What do you want? Go see Captain Carius. Talk to Captain Carius if you're looking for something to do. Head through the General Quarters and all the way up the south staircase. On the third floor are his chambers. That's where you'll find him. If you're here about that colony business, talk to Carnius Magius. He's in the Imperial Cult Shrine.

7709380342601831.Text: What do you want? Talk to Captain Carius if you're looking for something to do. Head through the General Quarters and all the way up the south staircase. On the third floor are his chambers. That's where you'll find him. If you're here about that colony business, talk to Carnius Magius. He's in the Imperial Cult Shrine.

149479153259528429.Text: Welcome to Solstheim, jewel of absolutely nowhere. It's a miserable place, even for the warmbloods. If you want to leave, I'd be happy to take you back to Vvardenfell. If you feel you must stay, speak with Captain Falx Carius in his chambers at Fort Frostmoth. Captain Carius is the commander here. Not a bad man, but he is a fool for remaining in this place. So cold. So cold. If you are here about the colony, Carnius Magius is the man you will speak to. Find him at the Imperial Cult Shrine.

2724215468161597167.Text: Do you wish to go back to Vvardenfell as much as I do? What about Raven Rock, where the new colony is going to be built? I can take you there for a price.

1454427736574310322.Text: Greetings. Are you in need of transport? S'virr will gladly take you to Fort Frostmoth in Solstheim for a small fee.

55049407942726433.Text: What can I do for you, %PCName?

13398197592990524057.Text: Greetings, %PCName. We've got beds and we've got food. Either of those interest you?

3215618774101028298.Text: What makes you think I want to chat with the likes of yeh?

2987274001485912272.Text: Passin' out the equipment? Hand it over, then.

2364123155138594610.Text: Carnius sent you, eh? Talk to Toralf.

4621953324720288.Text: Yeh did yer job. Now leave me alone.

2478017356207209349.Text: I ain't lookin' to chat. Just give me the equipment yeh've got.

27292280622189423931.Text: I ain't in charge. Talk to Toralf.

192672818536398461.Text: What? I ain't yer pal. Scram.

2544719292807727390.Text: Hand over the equipment yeh've got for me. Hurry up, now.

1386412937013388.Text: Yeh gave me the stuff already. Get lost.

2061627532884214744.Text: Hurry up and give me the equipment. I ain't here to jabber with yeh.

2208010203249216418.Text: What are you talkin' to me for? Toralf's in charge.

92788803043310556.Text: Yeh've already given me equipment. I've got nothin' more to say to yeh.

1421881991555426454.Text: Handing out the equipment like a good little flunky, eh?

1135313861614619517.Text: You here with the stuff? Talk to Toralf, then.

9945228012702924227.Text: That's some nerve yeh've got there, attackin' us! Thnk we'll have to teach yeh a lesson!

285055421062118239.Text: All done, are yeh? Good. Just give me my equipment, and we can wrap this up.

1892735961030512430.Text: Hurry up and pass out the equipment, you. We don't have time to waste.

1128629418171229426.Text: So, you're Carnius' lackey, are yeh? Make it quick. Pass out that equipment; we've got work to do.

12451112986252793.Text: %PCName! Thank you so much for saving me.

48326451681511067.Text: %PCName! They trapped me down here, and threatened to kill me! Are you sure you got them all?

2326845792330332319.Text: Hi, %PCName. I'm still waiting on those Bittergreen petals so I can take care of these roots.

10853173651032025723.Text: This sure looks like the place. These roots probably extend all the way up to those trees at the surface.

5259144842186318381.Text: You're going to show me where the roots are, right?

25737773994579218.Text: Not much we can do about the grove of trees unless we can get at the roots, %PCName.

1329811910486715912.Text: Even though the Spriggans are gone, we still can't cut down this grove of trees.

276992060962728648.Text: Hey, %PCName. Nice work with those Spriggans. We can get to the trees now for sure, but we still won't be able to cut them down. I tried explaining it once already, but they won't listen - something's not right with this grove.

2122322807630128758.Text: Sorry, %PCName, but as far as I'm concerned, I'm off duty as long as those Spriggans are out there.

1196942241319028406.Text: I gave yeh the stuff Carnius wanted yeh to have; nothin' left to say. We're done here.

1650026397463117269.Text: Carnius had somethin' for yeh, once the messenger was dead. Here, take this and get movin'. He'll be wantin' to know that this lad won't be arrivin'.

605971881964319970.Text: Well, there's no contest now. He's done for.

27513566569273878.Text: Jus' bring the messenger here, an' the wolves'll make short work of 'im.

15813101361827224851.Text: Right. Now we're to it. You go fetch this messenger fellah, and I'll take care of gettin' the wolves.

54553145950021057.Text: Let's get a move on, %PCName. Don't want to get Carnius mad, now do yeh?

223146195503927628.Text: Well now, look who it is. Carnius said ye'd be helpin' me. Took me a minute to realize it weren't a joke. Surprised to see me, are yeh? That trick ring of Carnius' did quite a number. Don't have one this time around, though, so I'd hate to have to put yeh down. Don't get any bright ideas about fightin'. Now, we'd best get going if we're goin' to catch this lad. We can sort out the details once we get there. Let's go.

114270181938618692.Text: Well now, look who it is. Carnius said ye'd be helpin' me. Took me a minute to realize it weren't a joke. Don't worry - I won't be holdin' that little scuffle against yeh. Yeh were jus' followin' orders is all. We'd best get going, if we're goin' to catch this lad. We can sort out the details once we get there. Let's go.

333664632729110237.Text: We've got to keep moving. I don't want to get in trouble for not delivering this report on time!

5757229001129319453.Text: Uhhh....hey. Are you busy right now? I don't mean to bother you, but there's this report I need to deliver...

2962629379244376300.Text: Greetings, Factor. You're... you're not going to hurt me, are you?

2398417763206421432.Text: Greetings, Factor. You're... you're not going to hurt me, are you?

178468973268122550.Text: I, uhh.... I take it you have resolved your problems with Carnius? Perhaps you should take the matter up with Falco, back at the site.

1687916831263988386.Text: I, uhh.... I take it you have resolved your problems with Carnius? Well, that makes you the ranking official at the Raven Rock site. In, uhh, in that case, I'd be happy to forward along the appropriate paperwork and have you instated as the local Factor. I hope that's satisfactory, your factor-ness....

120821022620246619.Text: Eh? Oh, you're here about the swords? Hrmph. Very well, here you go. Though I don't know that they'll be of much help to the likes of you.

2366516400311782892.Text: You have company business to discuss? Please step inside and see Carnius. Otherwise, turn right back around and head out the door you came in.

75997882642025872.Text: You have company business to discuss? Please step inside and see Carnius. Otherwise, turn right back around and head out the door you came in.

12137204171875128970.Text: Oh dear! Did I forget to mention the little problem we've been having with that trap? Oh, I do hope that doesn't slow you down too much. But I'm afraid there's nothing more I can do for you. Excuse me.

119429016317223278.Text: Excuse me. I've already explained that Carnius isn't here. There's nothing more I can do for you, so perhaps you should just run along.

307819644872419446.Text: Are you here to see Carnius? I'm afraid he's not in right now; oh, and he'll be so disappointed that you were unable to deliver that report on time.

541128583195415801.Text: Have you come for Stalhrim weapons, friend?

278121828774013129.Text: You have no business being here, stranger. Leave now.

1240378292978419696.Text: Have you come for Stalhrim armor, friend?

325701801178181719.Text: You...  you are not here to hurt us? Then perhaps you are different from the rest. You seek knowledge of the Stalhrim, yes?

993421727924225381.Text: We will have no dealings with the likes of you. Begone.

1587301611961310081.Text: Hello, %PCName. Is it snowing again? Feels like it, from the way my joints ache.

1746654331960830483.Text: Can't.... can't keep swinging... too tired. Just, just fight me, okay? Come on...

24651761034431073.Text: I suppose they've sent you to deal with me, haven't they? Well, then - let's get this over with! You're not some kind of coward, are you? Come on and fight me! If I'm going to die, then I'm going out with a bang!

17351132612092119890.Text: You..... get away from me. You killed my husband!

2716966081232629126.Text: Thank you for all that you've done for my family.

213512062141722153.Text: You..... get away from me. You killed my husband!

26352324161269821395.Text: Thank you for all that you've done for my family.

520430806276847729.Text: You..... get away from me. You killed my husband!

1318723371853612069.Text: Thank you for sparing Seler's life, %PCName.

48202890477912830.Text: Where's my husband? Is he okay?

5683612427292553.Text: Are you going in there? You are, aren't you? What have they told you to do? Please don't hurt my husband!

2839468275546700.Text: Oh please, please. Don't hurt my husband. He's just an old man.

15329198293139129151.Text: Forgive me, but I really need to concentrate. I want this estate to be just right, and I don't want to mess anything up. Excuse me.

25366298761596226296.Text: Is this where you want your estate built, %PCName?

101175769359822988.Text: Umm.... We're not near any of the building sites for the estate, %PCName. You've got to show me exactly which one you want it built at. I don't want to make any mistakes.

26205267003006131429.Text: Okay, %PCName. Ready to pick a spot for your estate?

27102120372667311758.Text: Hello, %PCName. Are you here about the estate?

260232987337118092.Text: You killed them all? Wow, %PCName. Thanks!

22907295551529622913.Text: There might still be more of them, %PCName! Watch out!

494926112071831991.Text: Thanks for the drink, %PCName. You're a real friend.

44533897654016632.Text: Hi there, %PCName. Falco says I'm supposed to guard this room. He didn't say why, though. And boy, is it ever boring.

6591298901346623414.Text: I don't have to guard that room anymore; Falco said so.

25596259763203123047.Text: Don't tell anyone, but I just wanted to take a break for a little while. Standing there looking all official is hard work, you know?

1240131279302398997.Text: Hello, %PCName. Never thought I'd be doing this...  I'm supposed to guard this room. Orders from Falco himself. Weird, huh?

3033232045166867068.Text: The company's work is never done, %PCName. What can I do for you?

960112215290824582.Text: Hi there, %PCName. Thanks for helping out.

1722618575146031517.Text: Good work. Better go see Carnuis.

44025166127206545.Text: Ahem.... Uhh, %PCName? Carnius wants to see you. You know, about that job.... the one that you were doing. You should let him know it's done. Okay? Great.

12561121501228510870.Text: Aldam is dead? That's not what I signed on for... this is getting out of hand. The deal is off.

1898719380193164832.Text: What are you doing? Stay close to the guard - I'll come to you when I'm done.

2410326358644027328.Text: I'm not making a move until you distract the guard.

679470891973427166.Text: I know you're here to help, but someone killed the guard. That'll draw way too much attention to the mine, and maybe to me. No way. I'm not doing it.

17488234182763329812.Text: So, you're here to help, are you? Well, I need you to distract the guard.

139392774338722980.Text: Hey.... Why do you keep looking at me like that?

16690162282814425053.Text: You're not going to get me in trouble, right? You heard my explanation - it was all Carnius' idea!

693511093187138643.Text: %PCName! What are you doing here? Uh... there's a perfectly good explanation for this, I assure you...

317118596236916007.Text: Oh, uhh.... hey there, %PCName. Didn't see you. Excuse me, but I need to, uhh, get back to work.

270114496421520.Text: Hey there, %PCName. What are you doing here?

2681829579299431420.Text: I.... I'm taking care of the supplies. Just keep your distance, all right?

25691304231661331518.Text: Don't try to intimidate me, you....  that sword. Looks like Elberoth's. Is that his saber?

265037037270167036.Text: I suggest you put that weapon away before trying to have a conversation with me, %PCRace.

259209342236872336.Text: You looking for a fight, %PCRace? If not, you'd better put down those fists.

2591910150618915924.Text: Well now. Have they finally sent someone to deliver the extra payment I requested? I told them that if I was going to make this trip on top of what Elberoth was doing, it'd cost them. And I'm getting tired of waiting.

1004527965833624204.Text: I have business with your superiors, not with you. Run along, now.

3057086681564132279.Text: Well, if it isn't you again, %PCName. How are you?

412984073925765.Text: I just can't thank you enough for rescuing me from that horrible shipwreck, %PCName. I'm sure I'll have a delightful time here in the colony; I do hope that the people here are nice and like to chat.

1530645621598621733.Text: This looks like a nice place. Maybe we should go find whomever's in charge, and see if they have a nice room I could borrow for a while. One without quite so much, well, dirt.

761616523031323831.Text: What is it? You're not going to turn out to be some crazy person, and take me out into the woods and kill me, right? You seem normal; you're still going to let me go with you to wherever you came from, right?

230851141432500826.Text: You.... you killed them? They're all gone? Don't leave me here; you've got to let me go with you!

289385142322707785.Text: Get them away, get them away! The horrid things!

13635652223098726.Text: Look, I said I'll leave. Just stay away from me, will you?

1914725554257516648.Text: OW! Okay, okay. I'll go away - just stop hitting me! Just give me a minute to collect myself. I promise I'll be gone the next time you come back. Oh, that's going to leave such a bruise...

2241431820148328076.Text: I'll not give in to you! Cease this violence before you bring death and destruction on yourself!

30509177131619512330.Text: Sent you to talk me out of this, have they? Those devils won't be rid of me so easily! Talk all you like, %PCRace. The curse I place on you will be all the more painful for it.

841181381115431696.Text: You'll not infect me with your Devilry, %PCRace! I am here to defend Nature, and I'll do so at any cost! Now begone!

26140112882316412518.Text: You! If you're part of this accursed plot to rape the land, you'll suffer the same fate as all the rest! You'll be cursed.... cursed, I tell you!

11562280541439225950.Text: Well, %PCRank.... it's a bit of a surprise to see you. You weren't supposed to survive the Skaal attack.

881318962399820059.Text: I must say, I'm surprised to see you. Toralf was supposed to make sure you didn't return. I just can't count on good help, can I? Sorry, %PCRank, but I'm afraid I no longer have need of your services, and you know a little too much to be allowed to live. But I'll remedy that situation right now.

1786196741151416518.Text: What is it, %PCRank? Is this about your current assignment?

30471524561925967.Text: Well, %PCRank. It's time for a bit of a change. Now that we know for sure there's Stalhrim to be had in the mines, we need to clear everyone out of the colony. Of course, I can't do that without arousing too much suspicion; the colony will have to appear to fail on its own. Your next assignment will start that process.

891623256999511413.Text: The trader's is almost done? Fine, fine. Now leave me alone.

26627217472575114922.Text: The smithy is done? Fine, fine. Now leave me alone.

1191715434222227750.Text: What is it, %PCRank? Is this about your current assignment?

97251368983329196.Text: Not now, %PCRank. I'm expecting a decision from Falco. It's colony business, and it doesn't concern you.

31518116191877621451.Text: Oh, don't even say it. I can tell by the look on your face. Falco gave you his little pep talk, didn't he? "Oh, %PCName.... I need your help. Won't you help me?" Ugh. Perhaps instead you should think about doing yourself a favor and aiding me, %PCRank.

16591690744239055.Text: What is it, %PCRank? Is this about your current assignment?

27045154312185730008.Text: What do you want? Is this about the East Empire Company? I'm a very important man, I'll have you know, and I have no time for anything other than business.

3188930835136513167.Text: So, Carnius is dead? That makes you the new Factor, I assume. I can't say you've exactly earned the position, but I imagine you can't be any worse at it than he was.

10914232193242315016.Text: Carnius is dead? Well, then the colony is as good as closed.

30416620203256618.Text: What can I do for you, Factor?

8185135575641753.Text: Carnius is dead? I'm sorry, %PCName. I didn't think it would come to that. You've lived through it, though, and Raven Rock will be a better place for it. Now, someone needs to be put in charge.... I know I don't want the job. You're next in line for it, so I'll make sure the paperwork goes through. You're now the Factor of the Raven Rock division of the East Empire Company. Congratulations!

237975006319752247.Text: Take that note to Carnius, %PCName, and see what he has to say for himself.

4870214732269414021.Text: We've been had. This wasn't really a Skaal attack - it was mercenaries dressed up like them to fool us. If they'd succeeded, the whole thing would've been blamed on the wrong people. This stinks of Carnius, and I think it's time you confront him. Take this note, and show him the proof you've got of his involvement.

2227930824301646431.Text: %PCName!  We've been the victims of a Skaal attack!

31079310422400214621.Text: In his continuing effort to make life as difficult as possible, Carnius has sent word that several silver longswords have arrived. He refuses, however, to have them sent out to us. Can you go get them? I believe Constans Atrius should have them at Fort Frostmoth.

27831233573233451.Text: %PCName, you stay here in case there are more of them!

1978619093987013736.Text: I need you to stay here, %PCName. Don't wander off.

2709428953492915727.Text: %PCName, you need to get that report to Carnius NOW. Get moving!

150302301730389581.Text: %PCName, do me a small favor. Get word to Carnius that construction of the trader's outpost is almost completed.

25815157061426012680.Text: %PCName, do me a small favor. Get word to Carnius that construction of the smithy is almost completed.

1878728091204324460.Text: Have you given thought to aiding me, %PCName?

122688643221828220.Text: Whether you know it or not, %PCName, you have arrived at a crossroads.

153445871131321090.Text: Hello, %PCName! Are you here on assignment, or did you just stop by?

1220329963337525991.Text: So, Carnius talked you into joining this little venture, did he? Very well. I'll be managing the site from here, and answering only to Carnius. Since you're here, I have an assignment for you.

6119103351129816341.Text: I'm sorry, %PCRace, but I'm here on official business, and I don't have time to chat. Any official inquiries should be directed to Carnius Magius at Fort Frostmoth.

1866814640291446911.Text: Thanks for bringing us. I'd better get to work.

2870613178709421795.Text: Can we maybe just concentrate on getting there safely? I don't like it out here.

292411499475591286.Text: If you're going to act as our escort, I suggest you speak with Gidar. He knows the way.

2508455616786503.Text: Pardon me, but I'm waiting for someone. If it's important, ask Gidar.

122492909186177023.Text: Another day, another hundred piles of ore.... What can I do for you, %PCName?

2273206712550913998.Text: I'd like to stop and chat, but there's much to be done.

26249158352077124314.Text: Thanks for making sure we got here safely, %PCName. I appreciate it. I'd better get to work. Excuse me.

191449862156047.Text: Don't look at me; I'm just following Gidar.

2677139691397524110.Text: Oh, you're the escort? Better talk to Gidar, then. We're supposed to follow him.

2227120150129120658.Text: I can't talk now. I'm waiting for our escort to show up. 'Sides, Gidar is in charge.

7049264301875713799.Text: Thanks again for the escort. If you'll excuse me, I have a lot of work to do.

27533150712461921887.Text: Well, we've made it here in one piece. Thanks for the escort, %PCName. Perhaps we'll run into each other again.

32149213684488912.Text: Is there a problem? I thought you were ready to go.

23913345637994842.Text: What's the hold up? We're ready to go, so let's keep moving.

10305268598373813.Text: So you're the escort? Well, fine. Let me know when you're ready to go.

14410146582869918431.Text: Sorry, %PCRace. Can't talk right now; we're waiting for our escort to Raven Rock. Go see Carnius Magius in the shrine if you need something.

1957259931025012876.Text: Good luck in your adventures, friend.

612811793116421980.Text: You have found what you seek, friend. You should continue on your own for now. I will stay in this place. Good luck to you.

2755111668738012346.Text: You have found what you seek, friend. You should continue on your own for now. I will stay in this place. Good luck to you.

36182008517969942.Text: You were not to interfere! Now you face us both!

17161184441559432599.Text: We will enter the ruins on our own when we are ready.

20083200091101611667.Text: I have won the argument with my brother, and we will do things as I decide. Explore the ruins on your own, stranger. We will enter them on our own when we are ready. Here, take this key. We have no interest in treasure, but perhaps you can use it. Good luck to you.

10983293811786215385.Text: My brother bested me, though it could have gone either way. As he has won the argument, we will follow you into the ruins. Here, take this key. My brother and I have no interest in treasure, but perhaps you can use it to find what you seek. Let us go.

3205113087239926396.Text: Greetings. I suppose you're here to explore these ruins?

30573282272275624106.Text: Good luck in your adventures, friend.

143518688481017612.Text: You have found what you seek, friend. You should continue on your own for now. I will stay in this place a while longer. Good luck to you.

31849260202577125420.Text: You have found what you seek, friend. You should continue on your own for now. Good luck to you!

188124870198021300.Text: You were not to interfere! Now you face us both!

1467626429485018928.Text: We will enter the ruins on our own when we are ready, friend. My brother has won our argument.

171398799317837490.Text: My brother has won the argument, and we will do things as he has decided. Explore the ruins on your own, friend. We will enter them on our own when we are ready. Here, take this key. We have no interest in treasure, but perhaps you can use it. Good luck to you.

2725290531860820515.Text: I have bested my brother, though it could have gone either way. Because I have won our argument, we will follow you into the ruins. Here, take this key. My brother and I have no interest in treasure, but perhaps you can use it to find what you seek. Let us go.

7271278952064618695.Text: Greetings, friend! Are you here to explore these ruins?

31074262511675025898.Text: Your timing is excellent. I am looking for someone to lead a band of adventurers to Firemoth Fort.

11348180411884827267.Text: What is the situation with Firemoth Fort?

83386568163719408.Text: Hold on and we're on our way.
Script: Set sail to 1 ;in local script for firemoth_sailor

18298208411770219941.Text: I will wait here until you are ready.

231724779969828437.Text: Are you ready to sail to Firemoth Fort?

14500272529981491.Text: Are you ready to sail back to Seyda Neen?

242753219211862537.Text: Lead the way! We're here to kill!

3238626648911710898.Text: I'll follow you. I hope you know what you're doing.

1167012954534529711.Text: Thank you for finding me! The mushrooms have kept me alive for some time now. Lead the way, and I'll help anyway I can.
